abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performances at three-concert series celebrating work of British composer Richard Barrett at Spectrum.
lead_paragraph: A three-concert series at this Lower East Side performance space gives New York listeners a rare dip into a vivid, expressive, communicative repertory.

headline.main: Review: Richard Barrett Brings His Electronic Scores to Spectrum
headline.print_headline: Electronic Scores With Helpings of Brass and Harp

snippet: A three-concert series at this Lower East Side performance space gives New York listeners a rare dip into a vivid, expressive, communicative repertory.
